Name: Hussein
description:
Hussein is a 20-year-old youth who dropped out of school at an early age in order to provide for his family because of their unstable living conditions. Two years ago, he started working at an automobile repair shop where he made every effort to increase his family's income.

Hussein is a first-time borrower from Kiva's field partner, Al Majmoua, and he wishes to use this worker loan in order to open his own automobile repair shop. Hussein wishes to improve his business to an extent that he can secure a sustainable source of income for himself and his family as well.
